turns
Class TurnController

java.lang.Object
  turns.TurnController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Saveable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TurnController.TurnControllerImplementation
public abstract class TurnController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Saveable

TurnController is class to handle Turn advancements conviently.

Author:
Niels Thykier

Method Detail

fieldHasBeenAltered

public abstract void fieldHasBeenAltered()
Call when the field has been altered.

playTick

public abstract void playTick()
Play the next unit's prepare or step phase (depending on what part of the turn it is). If a turn was finished, a new one will be started.

playPreparePhase

public abstract boolean playPreparePhase()
Play out the complete prepare phase of all units. This will never advance the time by a turn (or step).

Returns:
false, if the prepare phase could not be played (e.g. it was already over)

getCurrentTurn

public abstract Turn getCurrentTurn()
Gets the current turn of the simulation.

Returns:
The current turn.

clearAll

public static TurnController clearAll()
Clears all turns from the controller as if they had never been there.

Returns:
The TurnController (for convience)

loadFromXMLElement

public abstract TurnController loadFromXMLElement(org.w3c.dom.Node turnControllerNode)
                                           throws XMLParseException
Loads a turn controller from a XML node

Parameters:
turnControllerNode - The node.
Returns:
The newly loaded TurnController.
Throws:
XMLParseException - Thrown if the XML node was malformatted.

generateXMLElement

public abstract org.w3c.dom.Element generateXMLElement(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
Description copied from interface: Saveable
Generates the XML Element that the class can be loaded from. The element (which is returned) is NOT attached to the document, merely created.

Specified by:
generateXMLElement in interface Saveable
Parameters:
doc - The Document of the XML file.
Returns:
The element with the whole substructure completed.

getInstance

Static method for acquiring an instance of the TurnController class.

Returns:
A TurnController.
